name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stock market calculator target and stoploss

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help to calculate the total number of stocks/lots you can purchase and their target and stop-loss price

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help the investors and traders calculate the total number lots/stock they can buy with their investment. Also helps them to understand exactly where they need to put stoploss and target. User can select the percentage for stoploss and target and the calculator will tell them, Exact price they need to put target and stoploss
